meanings.sent1: The clunk of the hammer hitting the metal echoed in the workshop.
meanings.sent2: I heard a loud clunk when the metal pipe fell on the ground.
meanings.sent3: The clunk of the old car engine made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The clunk of the closing door signaled the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: The clunk of the coins dropping into the piggy bank was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: To make a dull, metallic sound.
meanings.sent1: He accidentally clunked the pots together while washing dishes.
meanings.sent2: The old engine clunked loudly before finally starting.
meanings.sent3: The robot clunked around the room, bumping into walls.
meanings.sent4: Her heart clunked in her chest as she nervously waited for the results.
meanings.sent5: The heavy book clunked onto the table as she dropped it in exhaustion.

meanings.sent1: The clunk of the falling tree branch startled the birds.
meanings.sent2: The clunk of the rock hitting the ground echoed through the canyon.
meanings.sent3: The clunk of the hammer hitting the nail was oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent4: The clunk of the heavy door closing behind him signaled his departure.
meanings.sent5: The clunk of the weights hitting the gym floor indicated a successful workout.

meanings.definition: To move with a heavy, dull sound.
meanings.sent1: The old truck clunked along the bumpy road.
meanings.sent2: The suitcase clunked down the stairs as she struggled to carry it.
meanings.sent3: The robot clunked its way through the obstacle course, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: His boots clunked on the wooden floor as he walked towards the door.
meanings.sent5: The heavy machinery clunked as it started up, ready for another day of work.
